game.name: Rats Cooking
game.description:
Another one of the finest platform games for boys is here to allow you make your online gaming experience a memorable one! We are talking about a brand new and most commonly-played game named Rats Cooking, which is suited for all including children and families. Like all food specialists, this chief also wants to keep his kitchen get rid of the rats. Many deadly rats have just come from sewers and it is the only way to kill these invading rats to survive in this brand new adventure game. 

You have to play the role of a helping hand to this chief who wants to catch and kill these smelly rates. Make sure to grab the coins for a feast in this free online platform game. All you need is just sharpen your knife to kill all the rats and help this chief serve the highly scrumptious grilled meat during today special lunch. This chief searches for the fat rats since his butcher has missed out today to deliver the finest beef to your kitchen. 

Try to kill all the aggressive and deadly mutant rodents without losing the life of this popular chief of the town! In this funny action arcade game, you will have to slay the rats right away as you see coming to you and use their meat for your cooking. The killing of every rat will give you a coin, which you need to collect to buy new items and upgrade your abilities. It is up to you now to clear the street with these pesky rates and allow your customers to enjoy a tasty and fresh grilled meat!

game.mobileControlKeys: USE ICON TO MOVE ARROUND, TAP ON SCREEN TO KILL THE MOUSE
game.webControlKeys: ALL ARROWS TO MOVE, SPACE TO HIT THE RAT
